text: avvidham ninre nathan ninne terannetukkum. ninne avan svapna vyakhyanam pathippikkum. ninakkum ya'aîkhub kutumbattinum avanre anugrahannal purttikariccu tarum; ninre rantu purvapitakkalaya ibrahiminum is'hakhinum at purttikariccu keatuttapeale. tirccayayum ninre nathan ellam ariyunnavanum yuktimanuman
